text: Plymouth Adventure is a 1952 American drama movie directed by Clarence Brown and was based on the 1950 novel of the same name by Ernest GÃ©bler. It stars Spencer Tracy, Gene Tierney, Van Johnson, Leo Genn, Barry Jones, Dawn Addams, Lloyd Bridges, Noel Drayton, Tommy Ivo, Lowell Gilmore and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. It won an Academy Award in 1953. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1952 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Clarence Brown
title: Plymouth Adventure
